snippet: When Andy Murray was dragged to five sets in the opening round of the French Open and then again in the second, it was hard to believe this would be the year when the Scot could end Britain's 81-year wait for a men's Roland Garros champion....
lead_paragraph: When Andy Murray was dragged to five sets in the opening round of the French Open and then again in the second, it was hard to believe this would be the year when the Scot could end Britain's 81-year wait for a men's Roland Garros champion.

headline.print_headline: Survivor Murray Proves He Is a Force on Clay
headline.main: Survivor Murray Proves He Is a Force on Clay
